feed.title: PlaceHolderView Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest PlaceHolderView news and events.

entry.title: Gallery Example
entry.summary: This example demonstrate creation of a list of images with animation using PlaceHolderView. For the sake of this example we will be placing our images in the drawable folder.

entry.title: New Version 1.0.0
entry.summary: This blog post will test file name parsing issues when periods are present.

entry.title: Adding RSS Support
entry.summary:
This is a test post.
